name: Kona Gold Beverage, Inc.
description: Kona Gold Beverage, Inc. is a dynamic beverage company focused on developing and marketing innovative, health-focused products in the fast-growing beverage sector. Established in 2015 and headquartered in West Palm Beach, Florida, Kona Gold specializes in producing premium hemp-infused beverages, including ready-to-drink iced teas and energy drinks. The company aims to capitalize on the increasing consumer demand for functional beverages that enhance wellness and provide natural energy boosts. With a commitment to quality and sustainability, Kona Gold uses all-natural ingredients in its formulations and promotes the benefits of hemp-derived CBD. Their flagship product, Kona Gold Tea, has gained popularity for its refreshing taste and energizing properties, making it a favorite among health-conscious consumers. The company is also exploring additional product lines and flavors to further expand its market reach and cater to diverse consumer preferences. Kona Gold's mission is to become a leading player in the health beverage market by combining innovation, quality, and a dedication to promoting a healthier lifestyle for all.

seo.meta_title: Kona Gold Beverage, Inc. | Innovative Hemp-Infused Beverages
seo.meta_description: Explore Kona Gold Beverage, Inc., a leader in hemp-infused beverages. Discover our premium products and commitment to health and wellness.

faq.question: What products does Kona Gold offer?
faq.answer: Kona Gold offers hemp-infused iced teas and energy drinks, including Kona Gold Tea and Kona Gold Energy Drink.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Kona Gold Beverage?
faq.answer: Robert Clark is the CEO of Kona Gold Beverage, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Kona Gold headquartered?
faq.answer: Kona Gold is headquartered in West Palm Beach, Florida, USA.
